text:
The Nifty Futures on the Singapore Exchange, an early indicator of Nifty performance in India, is little changed at 8523.Here are all the stocks to watch today
Hindustan Petroleum: Refining capacity enhancedHindustan Zinc: Expects uptick in prices for next few quartersNHPC: To consider raising up to Rs 4,500 crore via corporate bonds; in pact with BHEL for hydro-power projects overseasPiramal Enterprises: To raise up to Rs 1,000 crore via bondsPower Grid Corporation: Approves Rs 273 crore of investmentsTake Solutions: QIP opens; floor price Rs 174.84 a share
title: Stocks to Watch: Axis Bank, Biocon, NHPC and More
